alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:07PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beaverhead County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1207 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Gilmore, or 40 miles west of Dubois, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lima, Dell and Bannack Pass. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 11 and 39 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
